titles: Hannibal and Scipio An historicall tragedy. Acted in the yeare 1635. by the Queenes Majesties Servants, at their private house in Drury Lane. The author Thomas Nabbes.
author: Nabbes, Thomas, 1605?-1645?
publisher: Printed by Richard Oulton for Charles Greene, and are to be sold at the white Lion in Pauls Church-yard,
